snippet.title: Pizza store robbed at Mayfield
snippet.content: A man armed with an iron bar robbed a Mayfield pizza store overnight. Shortly after 11pm on Monday, a man entered the Maitland Road store via a rear door. He approached four staff members and threatened them with the iron bar before stealing a small amount of cash from the till. He ran from the store prior to the arrival of police. A crime scene was established as detectives from Newcastle Local Area Command commenced their investigations. The man has been described as being of Asian or Aboriginal in appearance, about 170cm tall with a thin build and brown eyes. At the time of the robbery he was wearing a green hat with a black and white patterned bandanna or balaclava with a white hooded jumper, dark woolly gloves and dark long pants with black sneakers. Anyone with information about this incident should contact detectives as Newcastle Local Area Command, or Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.
